name: andMatcher
javadoc:
/**
 * Combines multiple StringMatchers into a single AndStringMatcher.
 *
 * @param stringMatchers The StringMatchers to combine. May be empty, in which case this method returns NONE_MATCHER.
 * @return A new AndStringMatcher instance that combines all provided StringMatchers.
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Combines multiple StringMatchers into a single AndStringMatcher.
 *
 * @param stringMatchers The StringMatchers to combine. May be empty, in which case this method returns NONE_MATCHER.
 * @return A new instance of AndStringMatcher that combines all provided StringMatchers using logical AND operation.
 * @throws NullPointerException if any of the input StringMatchers are null
 */

name: charMatcher
javadoc:
/**
 * Creates a string matcher that matches any occurrence of the specified character.
 *
 * @param ch the character to match
 * @return a string matcher that matches any occurrence of the specified character
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a string matcher that matches any occurrence of the specified Unicode code point (character).
 * 
 * This matcher will match the specified character regardless of its position in the input string.
 *
 * @param ch the Unicode code point to match, which must be a valid character
 * @return a string matcher that matches any occurrence of the specified character
 */

name: charSetMatcher
javadoc:
/**
 * Creates a string matcher that matches any character in the specified set of characters.
 *
 * @param chars the set of characters to match, cannot be null or empty
 * @return a string matcher that matches any character in the specified set of characters
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Creates a string matcher that matches any character in the specified set of Unicode code points.
 *
 * @param chars the set of Unicode code points to match, cannot be null or empty
 * @return a string matcher that matches any character represented by one of the specified code points
 */

name: commaMatcher
javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a string matcher that matches commas.
 *
 * @return A string matcher that matches commas.
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a string matcher that matches commas.
 *
 * @param none
 * @return A string matcher that matches commas, which can be used to filter or extract comma-separated values from strings.
 */

name: doubleQuoteMatcher
javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a string matcher that matches strings enclosed within double quotes.
 *
 * @return A string matcher that matches strings enclosed within double quotes.
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a string matcher that matches strings enclosed within double quotes, 
 * including the quotes themselves. This matcher can be used to match strings 
 * that are enclosed in double quotes as per JSON or CSV format.
 *
 * @return A string matcher that matches strings enclosed within double quotes.
 */

name: noneMatcher
javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a matcher that always matches.
 *
 * @return A matcher that always returns true for any input.
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Returns an instance of {@link Matcher} that will match any input, effectively making it a "matcher" that always succeeds.
 *
 * @return An immutable matcher that matches any input and never fails.
 */

name: quoteMatcher
javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a matcher that matches quoted strings.
 *
 * @return A matcher that matches quoted strings.
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a matcher that matches quoted strings, including both single-quoted and double-quoted strings.
 * The matcher will match any string enclosed in either single quotes (e.g., 'hello') or double quotes (e.g., "world").
 *
 * @return A matcher that matches quoted strings.
 */

name: singleQuoteMatcher
javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a string matcher that matches strings enclosed within single quotes.
 *
 * @return A string matcher that matches strings enclosed within single quotes.
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a string matcher that matches strings enclosed within single quotes, 
 * allowing for matching of strings like 'hello' or 'world'.
 *
 * @return A string matcher that matches strings enclosed within single quotes.
 */

name: spaceMatcher
javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a string matcher that matches whitespace characters.
 *
 * @return A string matcher that matches whitespace characters.
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a string matcher that matches any Unicode code point that is classified as a whitespace character.
 *
 * @return A string matcher that matches any Unicode code point that is classified as a whitespace character.
 */

name: splitMatcher
javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a string matcher that splits input strings based on whitespace.
 *
 * @return A string matcher instance for splitting input strings.
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a string matcher that splits input strings into substrings separated by one or more whitespace characters.
 *
 * @param input The input string to be split
 * @return A string matcher instance for splitting input strings, or null if the input is null
 * @throws NullPointerException If the input string is null
 */

name: stringMatcher
javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a matcher for the given string.
 *
 * If the input string is empty, returns a default matcher (NONE_MATCHER).
 * Otherwise, creates a new matcher from the character array representation of the string.
 *
 * @param str the input string to create a matcher for
 * @return a matcher for the input string
 */

name: tabMatcher
javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a string matcher for matching tabs.
 *
 * @return A string matcher that matches tabs.
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a string matcher that matches tab characters.
 *
 * @return A string matcher that matches tab characters.
 */

name: trimMatcher
javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a string matcher that trims whitespace from input strings.
 *
 * @return A pre-configured string matcher for trimming whitespace.
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a string matcher that removes leading and trailing whitespace from input strings.
 *
 * @param none
 * @return A pre-configured string matcher for removing whitespace from input strings.
 */
